phrs.translation: 真菌污染, 椰子猫属

sentences.sentence: Having nibbled off the thin outer layer of fruit, the civets put their digestive juices to work.
sentences.translation: 其次，在咬掉咖啡果实外面以层薄薄的壳后，麝香猫把咖啡豆吞入肚中让消化液进行消化。

sentences.sentence: Experts say wild civets are the most discerning, but their droppings are also the most difficult to harvest.
sentences.translation: 专家说野生的麝香猫对咖啡豆的辨识能力最佳，但是他们的便便也同样相当难收集。
